actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The velociraptor makes one Bite attack and one Claws attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 12). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the velociraptor can't Bite another target.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 4 (1d4+2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Maul
actions.desc: The velociraptor uses its claws to rip into one creature it is grappling. The target must make a DC 12 STR save, taking 10 (4d4) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

special_abilities.name: Hardy
special_abilities.desc: Any critical hit against the dinosaur becomes a normal hit.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The velociraptor has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of its allies is within 5 feet of the target and the ally isn't incapacitated.
